name: TRUFFLE
description: Hello! I am Ethan Robichaux and I solo developed this game over 4 months. At the time of TRUFFLE releasing I am a college student and I create games in my free time. This is my 4th full Steam game. TRUFFLE is also a complete remake of my first game with over double the content and made in an entirely new game engine. This game is completely free because I want as many people as possible to be able to play and enjoy the game I worked very hard on!
